column4: I want to upgrade from 8.04 to 10.04. Documentation tells me to go to System - Administration - Software Properties where I will find an Upgrade Tab. Help, I have no "Software Properties" Help
I get: 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
Linux markharmer 2.6.24-27-lpia #1 SMP Thu Apr 8 18:04:46 UTC 2010 i686 GNU/Linux
cat /etc/apt/sources.list  |  grep -i lucid does't work as a command
deb http://dell-mini.archive.canonical.com/ubuntu/ hardy main universe multiverse restricted
do it manually. change hardy in lucid and run "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"
sorry I am new to this, did you get it?
